description: Number of balanced Boolean functions of n variables.
references: B. Elspas, Self-complementary symmetry types of Boolean functions, IEEE Trans. Electron. Computers, 9 (1960), 264-266.
E. M. Palmer and R. W. Robinson, Enumeration of self-dual configurations, Pacific J. Math., 110 (1984), 203-221.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: H. Jamke, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10
